description: Everyone coming back to the Isle of Man will be contacted by the borders team, the government says.
title: Isle of Man coronavirus: Self-isolation checks for all returning residents
title_page: Isle of Man coronavirus: Self-isolation checks for all returning residents - BBC News
maintext: David Ashford said there was "always a risk, especially when the island has been without cases for so long, that people will now dismiss symptoms and think it's something else".
